create_game.title: Create Game
create_game.description: Create a game room, set a time limit and invite other players for a battle

join_game.title: Join Game
join_game.description: Fight against your friend using a key, or join a random game to play with a stranger

rules_and_cards.title: Rules & Cards
rules_and_cards.description: Play the tutorial to learn the game mechanics or browse the game rules and cards
